casebody.data:
In the Matter of Nicola Benevento et al., Similarly Situated, Respondents, against Joseph Schechter et al., Constituting the City Civil Service Commission of the City of New York, et al., Appellants.

Orders unanimously reversed on the law, without costs, and petition dismissed with leave to petitioners to serve new petition, if so advised. (See Matter of O’Gorman V. Schechter, 5 A D 2d 212.) Concur — Botein, P. J., Breitel, Valente and Bastow, JJ.
